title: Online Music Collaboration Auditions
content:
brampitoyo and I have decided to start a font band. We will be hosting auditions for this online collaboration here on Typophile.

Typical songs include the following hits:

- Baby, kern me closer to you
- (Yves) Peters, give me one more chance
- The Futura Is Now
- And much much more!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080128181029im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Untitled-1_5601.gif)

Both Bram and I play drums, guitar, bass, and we can sing a little too. We’re in need of the following:

A flugelhorn  
An Alpenhorn  
A singerist  
A manager  
The other stuff in the smarmy little graphic above with the horrendous font  
Etc., you name it!

We’re also excepting lyricistical ideas and mumblings. Please feel free to submit a link to something. Anything really. As long as it is good. Or not.

I live in Seattle, Bram lives in Portland, and you live? We’ll have to figure out the details later, but rest assured, we have the frontman straight from Typecon2007:

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080128181029im_/http:/typophile.com/files/20070428_0013_3564.jpg)

 [‹ Native languages are dying out](http://web.archive.org/web/20080128181029/http:/typophile.com/node/37315 "Go to previous forum topic") [Client Advice ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080128181029/http:/typophile.com/node/37587 "Go to next forum topic")
author: DanGayle

comments.content: I knew I should have bought an alpenhorn.
You never know when one of those things can come in handy, you know. I have a friend from Switzerland who plays one. It’s the Helvetica of instruments.
